website_summaries.verdict: It doesn’t matter if you’d rather be a Goblin Priest or Gnome Warrior, there are countless quests to do, monsters to slay, and new friends to make in World of Warcraft.
pros: Join the legendary MMORPG universe and quest with new pals for 60 days
Many character races to play as
cons: This game requires a monthly subscription to play

customer_reviews.title: Best way to buy game time IMO
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing WoW since it first came out and I have been using these prepaid cards the last few years. The nice thing is that when the time expires it doesn't keep billing you so if you put the game down for a few weeks/months (as I often do) then you don't pay for a ton of time you never use. It has been a while since I had a subscription but if I recall correctly these are cheaper because you don't pay tax on them but you do have to pay tax if you do the subscription where they bill you monthly. I could be wrong though....
customer_reviews.author: Peter D

customer_reviews.title: Great for gifting, as I couldn't find a way on the Blizz Store
customer_reviews.text: No problems with the code I purchased. I read the 1 star reviews of keys not working and was a bit worried, looks like all from some time in 2017 where maybe Blizz was having a problem with their code system.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Witt

customer_reviews.title: Love this option!
customer_reviews.text: Love having the option to purchase 60 days worth of WoW time and getting the code within minutes of paying. Very convenient and no need to head to a store to pick up a physical card. :)
customer_reviews.author: Carla Marie

customer_reviews.title: It was delivered instantly
customer_reviews.text: I like the lore. I like the characters. I like that I can Quest and just be part of a massive world. I dislike some of the fighting mechanics because they are a little off, but whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: Love this game, I play for a few hours most days. The most important part of playing WOW are the people/friends I have met from around the world. Talk about being an armchair traveler, I actually get to talk to people from different cultures. I have met some really wonderful people while playing this game. You could call it traveling on a budget. For $15 a month I can talk to the world and have adventure at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Knox

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: What can really be said that isn't already part of the description? Realistically, the price is essentially the same as individual monthly pricing of game play, but this can be used to give to a friend/family member instead of solo direct to your account. I received my information electronically nearly instantly after purchase, and it worked within minutes to get a friend back into the game.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for adding new toons to your guilds
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect way to dual-box when you need to add more toons to your private guilds. Once your second account has been activated with more time, you can create new toons and invite them into your guilds. It can get a little expensive if you're only doing one or two every couple of months, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R.

customer_reviews.title: Delivered by email in a couple of minutes. Plugged ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered by email in a couple of minutes. Plugged ino my blizzard account and was set to go. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: L J Altes

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased all the Warcraft card received it within two minutes Put the code into the game and was on in seconds would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: WoW is a good deal.
customer_reviews.text: I started playing this game when WoW first came out. It has changed quite a bit since then, but all for the better. The system has been streamlined, and it is no wonder why this is the top rated game out there. The beauty of the biomes alone that you are exploring could be enough to excite new players, but the gameplay, the action, and the cooperative teamwork put it over the top. Should one of my friends start playing this game, I would not hesitate to get them a game card for it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Snelson

customer_reviews.title: First time buying a 60 day card
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could play the beta for classic. I never bought a 60-day card before. The code arrived fast and work without any problems. I wish I could say, getting in to play the beta was just as easy. NOT lol
customer_reviews.author: Rockin' Robin

customer_reviews.title: No scratching
customer_reviews.text: This card is delivered in email with instructions on where to enter the code. The difference between this and the one you get at Walmart is with this one you don't have to scratch anything.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor JAM

customer_reviews.title: INSTANT!
customer_reviews.text: Copied the code and pasted it on redeem in my Blizzard account, immediately after purchase. NO problems. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: It does what it’s supposed to do!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have any issues adding the game time, and makes it an easy way to gift game time to a friend without having to wait for a Blizzard balance credit to post.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I'm back
customer_reviews.text: It had been eight years since I played; since I logged into my hunter that I had over 80 days of playtime on. One day over the summer, my brother and I resubscribed on a whim. People keep asking if I'm back and I haven't really had an answer, but yeah, I'm thinking I'm back. I'll see you in Azeroth.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian W.

customer_reviews.title: ... the code into the blizzard thingy and its all like yay you have game time now

Digital makes it so fast to obtain the code and get right back into the game to have so much fun!

Digital delivery is instant so I'm back in the game with little downtime. Been using these for years before and after tokens. Your no rush shipping credits work (or at least did) on these cards.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Johns

product_meta.title: World of Warcraft 60 Day Game Time [Digital Code] [Online Game Code]
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC/Mac Online Game Code| Edition:60 Day Time Card

With the World of Warcraft Pre-Paid Game Card you can continue your epic quest for 60 days. 

Follow the instructions at www.worldofwarcraft.com/gamecard and be up and running in minutes. The World of Warcraft Game Card is a perfect gift for any adventurer in Azeroth.
PC Minimum System Requirements:PC Recommended System Requirements: * Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom X3 8750
 * RAM: 2 GB RAM (1 GB Windows XP)
 * Hard Disk: 35 GB
 * Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT, ATI Radeon HD 4850, or Intel HD Graphics 3000
 * Supported OS: Windows
 * Additional Requirements: World of Warcraft Base Game, Internet connection, and Battle.net registration required

 * Processor: Intel Core i5 2400, AMD FX 4100 or better
 * RAM: 4 GB RAM
 * Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470, ATI Radeon HD 5870 or better
feature_bullets: A Pre-Paid Digital Code, 60-Day Subscription to World of Warcraft
Requires World of Warcraft Base Game
